title: Couldn't load files
description: Files failed to load when attempting to open them. Attempted several times without success.

title: UI layout broken on mobile devices
description: UI elements are misaligned and overlapping on mobile screens. Issue observed across different devices and browsers.

title: Search functionality not returning results
description: Performed multiple searches using different keywords, but no results were displayed. Search bar appears functional but does not fetch any data.

title: 404 error on profile page
description: Navigating to the user profile page results in a 404 error. Attempted to access multiple user profiles with the same outcome.

title: Forms submission not working
description: Tried submitting various forms throughout the application, but none of them successfully submit the data. No error messages displayed.

title: Slow loading times on dashboard
description: Dashboard takes significantly longer than usual to load. Noticed delays in fetching and rendering data widgets.

title: Incorrect data displayed in analytics
description: Analytics charts and graphs are displaying inaccurate data points. Checked against backend records which show correct information.

title: Login page not responsive on desktop
description: Login page elements are not resizing properly on desktop screens, causing buttons and input fields to overlap. Tried different browsers with the same issue.

title: Dropdown menu items missing
description: Dropdown menu on navigation bar occasionally fails to display some items. Clicking on the menu reveals only a subset of expected options.

title: Graphical glitches in image gallery
description: Image thumbnails in the gallery are occasionally displaying graphical artifacts. Refreshing the page resolves the issue temporarily.

title: Data loss on form submission
description: Submitting a form occasionally results in the loss of entered data. Issue observed when network connectivity is unstable.

title: Error message not displaying on login failure
description: Entering incorrect credentials does not trigger an error message. Page refresh required to retry login.
